21 #define MOVE_DOWN 1
22 #define MOVE_UP 2
23 #define MOVE_BACK 3
24 #define END_EFF_FRAME "j2s7s300_end_effector"
25 #define BASE_FRAME "j2s7s300_link_base"
26 #define SENSOR_FRAME "forcesensor"
27 #define FORCE_F_THRESH 0.5
28 #define FORCE_B_THRESH 0.5
29 #define ROTATION_STEP 10
30 #define MAX_STEPS 3
31 #define VEL_LIN_MAX 0.04
32 #define VEL_ANG_MAX 0.4

34 float thresh_lin = 0.01;
35 float thresh_ang = 0.15;

51 void getRPYFromQuaternionMSG(geometry_msgs::Quaternion orientation, double& roll,double& pitch, double& yaw)
52 {
53  tf::Quaternion quat;
54  tf::quaternionMsgToTF(orientation,quat);
55  quat.normalize();
56  tf::Matrix3x3 mat(quat);
57  mat.getRPY(roll, pitch,yaw);
58 
59  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Quaternion is : " << quat.x() << " " << quat.y() << " " << quat.z() << " " << quat.w());
60  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Converted R: " << roll << " P: " << pitch << " Y: " << yaw);
61 }
62 
63 void waitForActionCompleted()
64 {
65  std::string temp_res="";
66  while(ros::ok())
67  {
68  ros::spinOnce();
69  lock_status.lock();
70  temp_res = result;
71  lock_status.unlock();
72 
73  if (temp_res=="Stopped")
74  {
75  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Status : " << temp_res);
76  //Wait 1.5s extra for arm to settle due to inertia.
77  ros::Time start = ros::Time::now();
78  while(ros::Time::now()-start < ros::Duration(1.5)) ros::spinOnce();
79  break;
80  }
81  }
82 }

84 
85 void setPoseForDirection(int direction, geometry_msgs::PoseStamped& start_pose)
86 {
87  geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat;
88  switch(direction)
89  {
91  case MOVE_DOWN :
92  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(ROTATION_STEP),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0)); //Turn down
93  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
94  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
95  start_pose.pose.position.y=0.01; // Slightly up
96  start_pose.pose.position.z=-0.01; // Slightly back
97  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
98  break;
99  case MOVE_UP :
100  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(-ROTATION_STEP),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
101  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
102  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
103  start_pose.pose.position.y=-0.01;
104  start_pose.pose.position.z=0.01;
105  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
106  break;
107  case MOVE_BACK :
108  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(0));
109  start_pose.header.frame_id=END_EFF_FRAME;
110  start_pose.pose.position.x=0;
111  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
112  start_pose.pose.position.z=-0.1;
113  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
114  break;
115 
117  /*case MOVE_DOWN :
118  ROS_INFO("Move down");
119  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(20),angles::from_degrees(0)); //Turn down
120  start_pose.header.frame_id=SENSOR_FRAME;
121  start_pose.pose.position.x=-0.01; // Slightly back
122  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
123  start_pose.pose.position.z=0.01; // Slightly up
124  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
125  break;
126  case MOVE_UP :
127  ROS_INFO("Move up");
128  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(-20),angles::from_degrees(0)); //Turn up
129  start_pose.header.frame_id=SENSOR_FRAME;
130  start_pose.pose.position.x=0.01; // Slightly forward
131  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
132  start_pose.pose.position.z=-0.01; // Slightly down
133  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
134  break;
135  case MOVE_BACK :
136  ROS_INFO("Move back");
137  quat = tf::createQuaternionMsgFromRollPitchYaw(angles::from_degrees(0),angles::from_degrees(-20),angles::from_degrees(0));
138  start_pose.header.frame_id=SENSOR_FRAME;
139  start_pose.pose.position.x=-0.1;
140  start_pose.pose.position.y=0;
141  start_pose.pose.position.z=0;
142  start_pose.pose.orientation = quat;
143  break;*/
144 
145 
146  }
147 }
148 
154 void moveCup(int direction)
155 {
156  ROS_INFO("Calling moveCup");
157  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose, pose_in_base;
158  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
159  //Wait for TF buffer to fill up
160  ros::Duration(0.25).sleep();
161 
162  ros::Rate loop_rate(9);
163  if(direction==MOVE_BACK)
164  {
165  // Return to initial pose
166 
167  ROS_INFO("Move to initial pose");
168  cmd_pos.publish(initial_pose);
169  waitForActionCompleted();
170  ros::Duration(2.0).sleep();
171 
172  ROS_INFO("Move back");
173  ros::Rate vel_rate(100);
174  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped start_pose;
175 
176  lock_pose.lock();
177  start_pose = current_pose;
178  lock_pose.unlock();
179 
180  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Start_pose pose is : " << start_pose );
181 
183  while(ros::ok())
184  {
185  try
186  {
187  lock_pose.lock();
188  start_pose = current_pose;
189  lock_pose.unlock();
190 
192  setPoseForDirection(direction, start_pose);
193 
194  tf_listener.transformPose(BASE_FRAME,start_pose,start_pose);
195  break;
196 
197  }
198  catch (tf::ExtrapolationException e)
199  {
200  /* ROS_INFO_STREAM("Waiting for transform "
201  //<< e.what()
202  );*/
203  }
204  ros::spinOnce();
205  loop_rate.sleep();
206  }
207 
208  ROS_INFO_STREAM("goal pose is : " << start_pose );
209 
210 
212  while(ros::ok())
213  {
214  lock_pose.lock();
215  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose = current_pose;
216  lock_pose.unlock();
217 
218  float delta_lin_x = temp_pose.pose.position.x - start_pose.pose.position.x;
219  float delta_lin_y = temp_pose.pose.position.y - start_pose.pose.position.y;
220  float delta_lin_z = temp_pose.pose.position.z - start_pose.pose.position.z;
221 
222  if( std::fabs(delta_lin_x)>=thresh_lin
223  || std::fabs(delta_lin_y)>=thresh_lin
224  || std::fabs(delta_lin_z)>=thresh_lin)
225  {
226  geometry_msgs::TwistStamped vel_msg;
227  vel_msg.twist.linear.x = -delta_lin_x;//<0?VEL_LIN_MAX:-VEL_LIN_MAX ;
228  vel_msg.twist.linear.y = -delta_lin_y;//<0?VEL_LIN_MAX:-VEL_LIN_MAX;
229  //vel_msg.twist.linear.z = temp_pose.pose.position.z - start_pose.pose.position.z;
230 
231  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Publishing vel : " << vel_msg.twist.linear);
232  cmd_vel.publish(vel_msg);
233  ros::spinOnce();
234  vel_rate.sleep();
235  }
236  else
237  break;
238  }
239 
240  return;
241  }
242 
244  while(ros::ok())
245  {
246  try
247  {
248  lock_pose.lock();
249  start_pose = current_pose;
250  lock_pose.unlock();
251 
252  setPoseForDirection(direction, start_pose);
253 
254  tf_listener.transformPose(BASE_FRAME,start_pose,pose_in_base);
255  break;
256 
257  }
258  catch (tf::ExtrapolationException e)
259  {
260  /* ROS_INFO_STREAM("Waiting for transform "
261  //<< e.what()
262  );*/
263  }
264  ros::spinOnce();
265  loop_rate.sleep();
266  }
267 
268 
269 
270  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("Goal pose in self frame:" << start_pose);
271  //ROS_INFO_STREAM("pose_in_base pose :" << pose_in_base);
272  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Publishing goal pose ");
273  cmd_pos.publish(pose_in_base);
274 
275  waitForActionCompleted();
276 }

280 void poseGrabber(geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose)
281 {
282  lock_pose.lock();
283  current_pose=pose;
284  lock_pose.unlock();
285 }

287 
288 void forceGrabber(const hri_package::Sens_Force::ConstPtr msg)
289 {
290  lock_force.lock();
291  force_f=msg->forceF;
292  force_b=msg->forceB;
293  lock_force.unlock();
294 }
295 
296 void statusGrabber(std_msgs::String::ConstPtr status)
297 {
298  lock_status.lock();
299  result=status->data;
300  lock_status.unlock();
301 }
302 
303 void waitForPoseDataAvailable()
304 {
305  // This loop to wait until subscriber starts returning valid poses.
306  ros::Rate loop_rate(9);
307  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped temp_pose;
308  while(ros::ok())
309  {
310  lock_pose.lock();
311  temp_pose = current_pose;
312  lock_pose.unlock();
313 
314  ros::spinOnce();
315  loop_rate.sleep();
316 
317  if (temp_pose.pose.position.x != 0) break;
318  }
319  ROS_INFO("Pose data available");
320 }
321 
322 int main(int argc, char **argv)
323 {
324  ros::init(argc, argv, "feeder_position_control");
325  ros::NodeHandle nh;
326 
327  tf::TransformListener tf_listener;
328 
329 
330 
331  ros::Subscriber sub = nh.subscribe("/force_values", 1000, forceGrabber);
332  cmd_vel = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::TwistStamped>("/RobotControl/VelocityControl", 1000);
333  cmd_pos = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>("/RobotControl/PoseControl", 1000);
334  ros::Subscriber tool_pose = nh.subscribe("/j2s7s300_driver/out/tool_pose",1000, poseGrabber );
335  ros::Subscriber control_status = nh.subscribe("/RobotControl/Status",1000, statusGrabber );
336 
337 
338  ros::Rate loop_rate(9);
339 
340  waitForPoseDataAvailable();
341 
342  double local_force_f,local_force_b;
343  bool print_once_only=true;
344 
345  lock_pose.lock();
346  initial_pose=current_pose;
347  lock_pose.unlock();
348 
349  moveCup(MOVE_DOWN);
350 
351  while(ros::ok())
352  {
353  ros::spinOnce();
354 
355  lock_force.lock();
356  local_force_b=force_f; //Interchange sensors so that it makes practical sense
357  local_force_f=force_b;
358  lock_force.unlock();
359 
360  if (local_force_f >= FORCE_F_THRESH && local_force_b <FORCE_B_THRESH)
361  {
362  if(current_step < -MAX_STEPS)
363  {
364  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Max lower steps of " << MAX_STEPS << " reached.");
365  }
366  else
367  {
368  ROS_INFO("Move down");
369  moveCup(MOVE_DOWN);
370  current_step--;
371  }
372  print_once_only=true;
373  }
374  else if (local_force_f <FORCE_F_THRESH && local_force_b>=FORCE_B_THRESH)
375  {
376  if (current_step > MAX_STEPS/2)
377  {
378  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Max upper steps of " << MAX_STEPS/2 << " reached.");
379  }
380  else
381  {
382  ROS_INFO("Move up");
383  moveCup(MOVE_UP);
384  current_step++;
385  }
386  print_once_only=true;
387  }
388  else if (local_force_f >= FORCE_F_THRESH && local_force_b >=FORCE_B_THRESH)
389  {
390  ROS_INFO("Move back");
391  moveCup(MOVE_BACK);
392  ROS_WARN("Closing node");
393  break;
394  }
395  else if (print_once_only)
396  {
397  ROS_INFO_STREAM("Do nothing. Current step : " << current_step);
398  print_once_only=false;
399  }
400 
401  loop_rate.sleep();
402  }
403 
404  ros::spinOnce();
405 
406  return 0;
407 }
